0.1.0.name: connect20/Apptha_Mageshop
0.1.0.description: Daily Shop is a leading-quality magento theme designed exclusively for online fashion stores. You can download and get the theme up and run an online fashion shop quickly and easily. The attractive templates make your online store to excel. The theme is developed with elegant designs and full responsive design pattern functionalities making it a smart choice for setting up a best fashion shop.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
